snippet: An increase in attacks on computer systems that control critical infrastructure, factories and databases has prompted a new focus on cybersecurity legislation.
abstract: Increase in attacks on computer systems that control critical infrastructure, factories and databases prompt new focus on cybersecurity legislation that could require new standards at facilities where a breach could cause significant casualties or economic damage.
lead_paragraph: An increase in attacks on computer systems that control critical infrastructure, factories and databases has prompted a new focus on cybersecurity legislation.

headline.seo: New Interest in Hacking as Threat to U.S. Security
headline.main: New Interest in Hacking as Threat to Security
headline.print_headline: New Interest In Hacking As Threat To Security
